sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"美丽的，漂亮的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: beautiful, fair, handsome, lovely, pretty, fine
means: beautiful ： 普通用词，含义广泛，语气最强，指优美和谐，是一种几乎接近完美的美。指人时通常形容女人或小孩，很少用于描写男子。
fair ： 正式用词，多用于文学中，形容女子和儿童，侧重外表的美。
handsome ： 多用于描写男性的英俊潇洒。有时也形容女人，指其五官端正，体态秀丽。
lovely ： 普通用词，描写人时，主要指女人和小孩的相貌，语气不如beautiful强。
pretty ： 普通用词，语气比beautiful弱，多用于描写妇女、儿童以及小巧玲珑，精美可爱之物。
fine ： 指在容貌、身材或风度等方面令人感到可爱。用于事物时，强调形式或内容的优美。

sentence.Network_en: Sweden is lovely in summer— cold beyond belief in winter.
sentence.Network_cn: 瑞典的夏天非常宜人——冬天却冷得让人难以置信。

sentence.Network_en: It was just one of those lovely old English gardens.
sentence.Network_cn: 那正是一个那种古老的英式花园，非常迷人。

sentence.Network_en: "Such lovely clothes. I'd no idea Milan was so wonderful," she raved.
sentence.Network_cn: “这些时装太漂亮了。我没想到米兰是如此的精彩，”她赞不绝口。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)used to express delight or approbation; excellent
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英，非正式)［用以表示高兴或满意］好极了

lj.lj_ly: fish and chips and a few beers on the way back from a match—lovely jubbly!.
lj.lj_ls: 在看完比赛回去的路上来点鱼和炸土豆条，再来几杯啤酒——太棒了！。

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as lovely, you mean that they are very beautiful and therefore pleasing to look at or listen to.

example.tran: 你看上去真漂亮，马西娅。

entry.def: If you describe something as lovely, you mean that it gives you pleasure.

example.ex: Mary! How lovely to see you!...
example.tran: 玛丽，见到你真是太高兴了！

entry.tran: 亲切和善的；心地善良的
entry.def: If you describe someone as lovely, you mean that they are friendly, kind, or generous.

example.ex: Laura is a lovely young woman...
example.tran: 劳拉是个亲切友好的姑娘。
她是个心地善良的孩子。

means.word_mean: 1. a very pretty girl who works as a photographer's model
1. appealing to the emotions as well as the eye
2. lovable especially in a childlike or naive way

means.word_mean: 可爱的, 美丽的, 动人的

sentences.en: She was delivered of a lovely girl.
sentences.cn: 她生了一个可爱的女孩。

means.word_mean: 令人愉快的, 美好的

sentences.en: It's been a simply lovely afternoon.

jushi.english: Once lovely countryside is absorbed by urban sprawl.
jushi.chinese: 这个曾经风光秀丽的乡村在城市的无规划扩展中消失了。

jushi.english: What a lovely smile she has!
jushi.chinese: 她的微笑多么美丽动人!

jushi.english: I had a lovely meal this morning in that restaurant.
jushi.chinese: 今天早晨我在那个饭馆吃了一顿可口的饭。
